alert.note: Alert for Mazatzal Mountains; New River Mesa; Pinal, Superstition Mountains; Southeast Gila County (Arizona) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Phoenix (Central Arizona and California Desert)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued February 23 at 5:54AM MST until February 24 at 5:00AM MST by NWS Phoenix
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 5 AM MST FRIDAY ABOVE 4500 FEET... * WHAT...Snow above 4500 feet. Additional snow accumulations of 2 to 4 inches. Winds gusting as high as 40 mph Thursday evening. * WHERE...New River Mesa, Mazatzal Mountains, Pinal/Superstition Mountains and Southeast Gila County. * WHEN...Until 5 AM MST Friday. * IMPACTS...Poor visibility and slippery road conditions creating hazardous driving conditions. Affected roadways include Highway 60 and Highway 70.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.

area.areaDesc: Mazatzal Mountains; New River Mesa; Pinal, Superstition Mountains; Southeast Gila County
